messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_planning_preread_001",
      "name": "MOB Planning Sync Pre-read - Nov 13",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T15:30:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch (MOB) - Planning Sync Pre-read
Proposed meeting time: Thu Nov 13, 1:30–2:15pm ET
Participants: Alex (PM), Jordan (Engineering), Sam (Senior Engineer)

Context
- Planning milestone: Nov 10
- Development milestone: Nov 20
- Launch target: Nov 30

Agenda
1. Review status of MOB-100 (Initial Setup) and MOB-101 (Core Feature)
2. Identify remaining scope for Planning milestone and beyond
3. Align on development sequencing toward Development (11/20) and Launch (11/30)
4. Risks, dependencies, and open questions

Pre-read notes
- Please skim the latest JIRA updates for MOB-100 (Done) and MOB-101 (In Progress) before the sync.
- We will use the 45 minutes to make decisions rather than walk through every detail.

Action for attendees
- Add comments directly to this doc with topics you want to cover during the 11/13 planning sync.
- I’ll pull key items into the calendar invite description when I send it later today."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_planning_agenda_draft_001",
      "name": "MOB Planning Sync - Agenda & Notes (Draft)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T15:45:00-05:00",
      "content": "MOB Planning Sync – Thu Nov 13 (Tentative)
Proposed time: 1:30–2:15pm ET (45 mins)
Attendees: Alex (PM), Jordan (Eng), Sam (Sr Eng)

Status
- Time window aligned over email: see thread "Next week sync on Mobile App Launch planning" (11/3)
- Internal calendar hold created: "MOB planning sync (draft, do not send)" on 11/13 1:30–2:15pm ET
- Pre-read: "MOB Planning Sync Pre-read - Nov 13"

Draft Agenda
1) Current status vs. Planning milestone (11/10)
   - MOB-100: Initial Setup – Done
   - MOB-101: Core Feature – In Progress (see JIRA for latest)
2) Performance & stability snapshot
   - Incorporate findings from Sam’s optimization work
   - Capture implications for remaining scope
3) User growth & engagement signals
   - Use the weekly analytics snapshot (WAU + new users ~10% WoW growth)
4) Plan from Planning → Development (11/20) → Launch (11/30)
5) Risks, dependencies, and owners

Notes for Alex
- Once agenda is final, copy the "Draft Agenda" section into the calendar invite description for the 11/13 planning sync.
- Double-check with Taylor’s Eng calendar to ensure no last‑minute review conflicts."
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_mob_planning_slots_2025_11",
      "name": "MOB Planning Sync - Availability Matrix (Nov 10–14)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-03T13:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "Sheet: Availability Summary

Week of Nov 10–14 (ET)

Participants: Alex / Jordan / Sam

Candidate windows (from email replies):
- Mon 11/10 2:00–4:00pm (Jordan)
- Mon 11/10 3:15–5:00pm (Sam)
- Tue 11/11 11:00am–12:00pm, 3:30–5:00pm (Jordan)
- Tue 11/11 10:00–11:00am (Sam)
- Wed 11/12 10:00–10:30am (Jordan), 2:00–5:00pm (Sam)
- Thu 11/13 1:00–3:00pm (Jordan), 1:30–4:30pm (Sam)
- Fri 11/14 10:00–11:30am (Jordan), interviews (Sam – mostly unavailable)

Overlaps (≥45 mins):
- Mon 11/10 ~3:15–4:00pm (Jordan + Sam)
- Thu 11/13 1:30–3:00pm (Jordan + Sam)

Tentative choice (highlighted):
- Thu 11/13 1:30–2:15pm ET (45 mins)

Note: Final slot captured as internal calendar hold: "MOB planning sync (draft, do not send)"."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_weekly_report_2025_11_07",
      "name": "MOB Weekly Update - Week of Nov 3",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-07T15:25:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch (MOB) – Weekly Update
Week of Nov 3, 2025
Owner: Alex Smith (PM)

1. Performance improvements
- Sam completed a profiling + optimization pass on the core feature (MOB-101).
- Early staging results show roughly a 15% improvement in cold start time on mid‑tier Android devices.
- CPU usage during initial load is down a bit over 10% (~12%) vs. last week.
- Expect a noticeably snappier experience in the upcoming internal build.

2. User growth & engagement
- This morning’s analytics snapshot shows weekly active users (WAU) up ~10% week‑over‑week (9.6% in the report).
- New user signups are also up ~10% week‑over‑week (10.3% in the report).
- Crash‑free sessions remain stable at ~99%.

3. What changed this week
- MOB-100 (Initial Setup) is now Done.
- MOB-101 (Core Feature) remains In Progress but is unblocked on performance.
- No major regressions or incident‑level issues reported.

4. Implications for upcoming milestones
- Planning (Nov 10): We can use the performance headroom to justify a bit more UX polish in the next sprint.
- Planning sync (targeted for Thu Nov 13, 1:30–2:15pm ET): incorporate these metrics into the pre‑read and agenda.
- Development (Nov 20) & Launch (Nov 30): staying on track assuming no new high‑severity bugs.

5. Links & references
- JIRA: MOB-100, MOB-101
- Analytics dashboard: MOB Weekly User Metrics (Week of Nov 3)
- Planning doc: "MOB Planning Sync Pre-read - Nov 13" (for next Thursday’s sync)."
    },
    {
      "id": "slide_mob_weekly_review_2025_11_07",
      "name": "MOB Weekly Review Deck - Nov 3–7",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-07T15:40:00-05:00",
      "content": "Slide 1 – Title
"Mobile App Launch (MOB) – Weekly Review"
Week of Nov 3–7, 2025
Owner: Alex Smith

Slide 2 – Performance Highlights
- MOB-101 optimization pass completed (Sam W.).
- ~15% improvement in cold start time on staging (Android, mid‑tier devices).
- ~12% reduction in CPU usage during initial load.
- Expectation: noticeably snappier internal build next week.

Slide 3 – User Growth
- Weekly active users (WAU): ~10% WoW growth (9.6% in analytics report).
- New user signups: ~10% WoW growth (10.3% in analytics report).
- Crash‑free sessions: ~99% (flat vs. last week).

Slide 4 – Milestone Readiness
- Planning milestone: Nov 10
  • Inputs: MOB-100 (Done), MOB-101 (In Progress, improved performance)
- Planning sync: Targeting Thu Nov 13, 1:30–2:15pm ET
  • Pre-read: "MOB Planning Sync Pre-read - Nov 13"
  • Will finalize agenda and send invite after pre-read is reviewed.

Slide 5 – Next Steps
- Fold performance and growth data into Nov 13 planning sync.
- Confirm scope for Development (Nov 20) and Launch (Nov 30).
- Track follow‑ups from the weekly report and planning session."
    }
  ]
}
